titles.title: Quinebaug and Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor Act of 1993
A bill to establish the Quinebaug and Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2933-2934)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-556.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Quinebaug and Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor Act of 1993 - Establishes: (1) a Quinebaug and Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor in Connecticut; and (2) the Quinebaug and Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor Commission to assist appropriate Federal, State, and regional planning organizations and local authorities in the development and implementation of an integrated resource management plan for the Corridor's lands and water. Authorizes appropriations.
